name: trusys-llm-security-scanner
description: Detect AI/LLM-specific security vulnerabilities in your code with real-time scanning. Automatically installs semgrep - no manual setup required! Supports OWASP LLM Top 10, AI-enhanced remediation, and integrates seamlessly with VS Code's Problems panel.

llmSecurityScanner.rulesDirectory.description: Path to rules directory (relative to workspace root). Defaults to llm_scan/rules/python

llmSecurityScanner.severityFilter.description: Severity levels to show in Problems panel

llmSecurityScanner.includePatterns.description: File patterns to include in scans

llmSecurityScanner.excludePatterns.description: File patterns to exclude from scans

llmSecurityScanner.scanDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before scanning after file changes

llmSecurityScanner.autoInstallDependenci.description: Automatically install trusys-llm-scan on extension activation. Note: semgrep is ALWAYS installed automatically (required dependency) regardless of this setting. This setting only controls whether to also install trusys-llm-scan.

llmSecurityScanner.apiKey.description: API key for sending scan results to server (optional). If provided along with applicationId, results will be uploaded to the configured endpoint.
llmSecurityScanner.apiKey.markdownDescription: API key for sending scan results to server (optional). If provided along with `applicationId`, results will be uploaded to the configured endpoint.

llmSecurityScanner.applicationId.description: Application ID to associate with scan results (optional). If provided along with apiKey, results will be uploaded to the configured endpoint.
llmSecurityScanner.applicationId.markdownDescription: Application ID to associate with scan results (optional). If provided along with `apiKey`, results will be uploaded to the configured endpoint.

llmSecurityScanner.uploadEndpoint.description: REST API endpoint URL for uploading scan results (optional). Defaults to a standard endpoint if not specified.
llmSecurityScanner.uploadEndpoint.markdownDescription: REST API endpoint URL for uploading scan results (optional). Defaults to a standard endpoint if not specified.
